title: Did the one-day trip to Toronto to Milania Trump cost $174,000 in hotel fees?
subtitle: The Ministry of Foreign Affairs spent $174,000 on hotel rooms prior to the First Lady ' s visit to Toronto, where she led a delegation to the Enviectos Games.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: Melania Trump visited Toronto for one day, resulting in $174,000 in hotel fees.
